title: The Good Bite Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out
description: Opened summer 2012, this restaurant serves vegetarian fare in a casual atmosphere with counter seating. The lunch menu is seasonal and typically include dips with pita, soups and stews, salads, hand pies, quiche, and a selection of baked goods. Beverages include house-made soda and fresh brewed iced tea. Brunch on Sunday.
